categories.title: Analysis Topics
categories.subtitle: Manage topics for automatic document analysis

form.name: Name
form.searchTermsHint: Press Enter to add a term
form.languagesHint: Select languages for this analysis topic
form.languagesDescription: Which languages are used in this analysis topic? The AI will adapt its analysis accordingly.
form.urlFiltersDescription: These filters apply to all data sources in this analysis topic, unless the source has its own filters. Without filters, the complete sitemap will be searched.
form.includeHint: URLs must match at least one pattern. e.g. /documents/, /resolutions/, /council-info/
form.excludeHint: URLs matching a pattern will be skipped. e.g. /archive/, /login/, /search/, /\?page=
form.noFiltersWarning: Without URL filters, the complete sitemap will be searched - this can take a very long time!
form.scheduleCronHint: Configure via schedule builder (advanced cron optional)
form.aiPromptDescription: Defines which information the AI extracts from documents. Here you can specify which topics (e.g. wind energy) pain points and positive signals should relate to.
form.aiPromptHint: Define the JSON format and extraction rules
form.enabledHint: Inactive analysis topics are not crawled
form.purposeHint: Describe what the AI should analyze in this analysis topic
form.searchInfo: Search terms and document types help the crawler find relevant documents

categories.summaryPromptTemplate: Dashboard for "{name}": Show an overview of all {entityType} with key metrics. Purpose: {purpose}

dialog.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete analysis topic "{name}"? All associated data sources and documents will also be deleted.
dialog.reanalyzeConfirm: All documents in analysis topic "{name}" will be reanalyzed with the current AI prompt.
dialog.reanalyzeAll: Reanalyze all documents (not just low confidence)
dialog.noSources: No data sources in this analysis topic
dialog.showAllInSourcesView: Show all in data sources view

crawler.title: Start Crawler:
crawler.noFiltersWarning: No URL filters set - all URLs will be crawled!
crawler.tooManySources: More than 500 sources - please set filters or limit!

messages.createdWithAi: Analysis topic with AI setup created successfully

aiPreview.title: AI Setup Suggestions
aiPreview.subtitle: Based on name and purpose, AI generates suggestions
aiPreview.generatingHint: This may take a few seconds
aiPreview.facetTypesHint: Select facet types for data extraction
aiPreview.promptHint: The AI prompt defines which information is extracted

dataSourcesTab.title: Assign Data Sources
dataSourcesTab.description: Assign data sources to this analysis topic via tags
dataSourcesTab.matchAllHint: Source must have all selected tags
dataSourcesTab.matchAnyHint: Source must have at least one tag
dataSourcesTab.noTagsSelected: Select tags to search for data sources
dataSourcesTab.noSourcesFound: No data sources found with these tags
